record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.

settings.description: The settings associated with the authentication provider.

assertion_consumer_service_url.description: The Assertion Consumer Service URL for the service provider (Telnyx).

service_provider_entity_id.description: The Entity ID for the service provider (Telnyx).

idp_entity_id.description: The Entity ID for the identity provider (IdP).

idp_sso_target_url.description: The SSO target url for the identity provider (IdP).

idp_cert_fingerprint.description: The certificate fingerprint for the identity provider (IdP)

idp_cert_fingerprint_algorithm.description: The algorithm used to generate the identity provider's (IdP) certificate fingerprint

name_identifier_format.description: The name identifier format associated with the authentication provider. This must be the same for both the Identity Provider (IdP) and the service provider (Telnyx).

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was updated.
